page.title: 07Other Cultures
page.content: My family are{Chinese from Canton.} I have three brothers,making a family of four boys;Chi Wai is 13,Wai Yip is 11.I am Wai Kee and I am 11,my little brother is Wai Kwok and he is 10. We live in a terraced house in Retford,before that we lived in Grantham,Lincs. Dad worked as a{cook}in Newark and now works in a Chinese Restaurant in Retford.Mum does not speak English and she used to work in a cracker factory.Cousin Lizzy offered mum a job working in Worksop but mum decided to work in my uncle's Restaurant instead. Mum worked for three months and had an accident with boiling water.Now she is a housewife and is expecting a baby in August.We{speak Chinese}at home and{English at school.}
